title: Error in deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d
body:
Hello,

Thank for providing an exciting tool for motion analyses. I use the below codes and got an error with the last `create_labeled_video_3d` function (please see the screenshot 2). I guess that the error may be caused by the result with a `triangulate` function that says "Overall of frames=430, whereas Detected frames = 428" (screenshot 1), but I don't know how to fix it.

I'm also not sure that `config_path` in the sample code (`deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d(config_path, ['triangulated_file_folder'], start=50, end=250)`) mentions to the `config.yaml` file that was created by a `create_new_project_3d` function.

Thank you for your help.


**[Operating system and environment]**
 Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut2.2b7.

**[codes]**

```
deeplabcut.create_new_project_3d('3dmodel','kato',num_cameras = 2) 
deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras(config_path3d, cbrow=8, cbcol=6, calibrate=False, alpha=0.9) 
deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras(config_path3d, cbrow=8, cbcol=6, calibrate=True, alpha=0.9) 
deeplabcut.check_undistortion(config_path3d, cbrow=8, cbcol=6) 
deeplabcut.triangulate('/home/italab/DLC/3dmodel-kato-2020-09-25-3d/config.yaml', '/home/italab/DLC/sample', filterpredictions=True) 
deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d('/home/italab/DLC/3dmodel-kato-2020-09-25-3d/config.yaml', ['/home/italab/DLC/sample'], start=50, end=100)
```


**Screenshot 1 (deeplabcut.triangulate)**

![triangulate_result](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72374302/95046065-4bf9af80-071e-11eb-9205-9f3b4bedf285.png)

**Screenshot 2 (deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d)**
![labeled_result](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72374302/95046072-4ef4a000-071e-11eb-95f3-a2667ff005bf.png)
